column4: Fiat Chrysler CEO says met with Tesla  Apple CEOs
column5: OAKVILLE  Ontario Fiat Chrysler Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne said on Saturday that he had visited the heads of Tesla Motors Inc and Apple Inc during a recent trip to California.

column4: UPDATE 1-Fiat Chrysler CEO says met with Tesla  Apple CEOs

column4: Fiat Chrysler CEO says met with Tesla  Apple CEOs
